name: Set Phasers to Stun
description:
You are the last human on a space station trying to escape from aliens that have taken over. You have a stun gun in order to fend off the invincible alien in your attempts to escape a maze like space station. 

If you enjoyed this game (or not), please leave feedback here!

Credits:

Gabrielle VanAmberg

Howard Haynes
